enchantment.epic_core_api.poisoning.desc: Inflicts a level of poison effect based on the enchantment level.
enchantment.epic_core_api.sacrifice.desc: Causing soul damage equal to enchantment level.
death.attack.soul_damage.player: %1$s's body wants to escape%2$s, but unfortunately their soul hasn't kept up
enchantment.epic_core_api.divine_wrath.d: §cThe original damage type of weapon is replaced by void damage.
